title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers

records.QueryText: Farmer want to know information about How to control of fungal attack in Potato crop?
records.KccAns: Recommended for to control of fungal attack spray  Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP 40 gm.and streptocyclin 2 gram at 15 liter of water
Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP@ 300-400 gm/acre ya Metalaxyl-8% + Mancozeb-64% WP@300-500 gm/acre ya Mancozeb 75% WP@ 400-600 gm/acre spray Karen
Metalaxyl-8% + Mancozeb-64% WP

records.KccAns: spray Thiophanate methyl 70 % WP @ 15-20 gram per pump/tank .

records.QueryText: farmer want to know sowing time and seed rate of Ashwagandha crop?
records.KccAns: Seeds are sown during the second week of July. A seed rate of 10-12 kg/ha is required for this method of planting.
